ygData.subject: Re: AE fear spell
ygData.msgSnippet: As a matter of fact yes, I used the AE fear spell last night, our wizard was AFK a few minutes when we were suddenly jumped by 3 greater kobolds, typically we
ygData.messageBody:
As a matter of fact yes, I used the AE fear spell last night, our wizard was
AFK a few minutes when we were suddenly jumped by 3 greater kobolds,
typically we would fight them no problem, we held them off as long as we
could and just before I ran out of mana, sat down memd Wave of fear real
quick, and was able to send 2 of them away, the third resisted it. We
managed to kill that one and we were able to zone before the other 2 got
back.

Bree Wyndsdale
38th Cleric of Fennin Ro
-----Original Message-----
From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, July 19, 1999 5:51 AM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] AE fear spell


>From: Olli Haapam∩┐╜ki <olli.haapamaki@...>
>
>Have any of you people found real use for this spell? I tried it once
against the critters
>in Mistmoore and the result was that a dark sacrificer pet attacked me, i
think it was the
>closest critter. Is the effect area the same as in Word of Pain? Meaning
you have to be
>very close to the mobs you want to fear? How often is that spell resisted?
At the same
>rate as the basic Fear spell?
>
>I think the only use for that spell is when the party is being hammered by
multiple creatures
>and after casting going straigth to zone since the feared critters will
bring a whole army of
>other critters on us.
>
>Iyenya Goldenheart
>Lvl 27 dwarf cleric
>Innoruuk server
